CustomField.formula: IF(Passage_collecte_systematique__c = true , "SY.", "__.") & IF(Passage_collecte_sur_appel__c = true , "SA.", "__.") & IF(Passage_depot_retransmission__c = true , "RT.", "__.") & IF(Passage_depot_resultats__c = true , "RE.", "__.") & IF(Passage_specifique__c = true , "SP", "__.")
CustomField.label: Les raisons
